name: Apollo
description: Crowdsourced data labeler to create labeled training datasets for machine learning.

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

RAILS_ENV.description: The Rails application environment to run in.

RAILS_LOG_TO_STDOUT.description: Log in a tagged format to STDOUT.

SIDEKIQ_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of workers per Sidekiq process.

AUTH0_REDIRECT.description: The URL that Auth0 will redirect back to.

AUTH0_SPA_CLIENT_ID.description: The Auth0 client ID that the browser application will use.

AUTH0_AUDIENCE.description: The audience that represents the API in Auth0.
